deathPenaltyDetails: Ye lost a level, yer Gowd, an a piece o graith, but ye can git thaim aw back wi haurd wark! Guid luck - ye'll dae braw.
dyingOftenTips: Is this happenin aften? Here are some tips!
losingHealthWarning2: Dinna lat yer Halth drap tae zero! Gin ye dae, ye'll loss a level, yer Gowd an a peice o graith.
lowHealthTips2: Buy a Halth Potion frae the Rewairds column tae cower 15 Halth Pynts.
lowHealthTips3: Un-feenisht Dailies hurt ye owernicht, sae be farefu no tae add ower money at first!
lowHealthTips4: Gin a Daily isna due on a certain day, ye can disable it bi clickin on the pincil icon.
